description:
Whitecross Street Estate (various locations - see map)

(T60-T64) London plane (x5) - Reduce crown 4-5m. Remove basal & epicormics (pollards). The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth).
(T65) Maple - Reduce crown 3-4m. Remove basal & epicormics (pollards). The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth).
(T66) Liquidambar - Crown reduce 1-2m. Remove basal & epicormics (ornamental). The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth). Remove embedded tree grate at base of tree.
(T68) Amelanchier - FELL (remove tree). Peabody Housing will be undertaking appropriate re-planting replacement for the loss within the surrounding location.
(T70) Amelanchier - Crown thin 15%. Remove deadwood. 
(T72) Amelanchier - FELL (remove tree). Peabody Housing will be undertaking appropriate re-planting replacement for the loss within the surrounding location
(T73) Amelanchier - Remove deadwood
(T75) Amelanchier - Remove deadwood
(T77) Amelanchier - Remove deadwood
(T78) Amelanchier - Crown thin 15%. Remove deadwood.
(T79) Amelanchier - FELL (remove tree). Peabody Housing will be undertaking appropriate re-planting replacement for the loss within the surrounding location.
(T80) Amelanchier - FELL (remove tree). Peabody Housing will be undertaking appropriate re-planting replacement for the loss within the surrounding location.
(T81) Amelanchier - Remove deadwood
(T82) Tulip tree - Crown reduce 3-4m. Remove deadwood. The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth).
(T84) Apple - Crown reduce 2-3m. Remove dead. The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth).
(T85) Ash - Crown reduce 3-4m. Remove deadwood . The reduction is back to previous pruning points (removal of re-growth).
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
